attributes.action: reform council tax system to system which is just and does not penalize poor people!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Current system where Council Tax based on property value is not just because
- it penalizes property extension and improvement
- currently poor people [most pensioners] must pay 25% or even more of their net income to council while high-earners pays nothing in relation to their income.
- system is not based on ABILITY TO PAY.

My petition is to change system to charge some percentage of VAT as Council Tax / local tax.This system has following advantages:
- people with low income will pay less so they can spend more - this will improve their lives and economy as well.
- property extension/refurbishment which alters property value will not be penalized by raising taxes. This will boost construction industry as more people will decide to improve their houses!
- tax is in line with ABILITY TO PAY [less You spend less You pay and vice versa]
- less administration&much lower cost of collection
- clear system
- system will encourage local councils to create better environment to businesses.
